Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class CloudTile

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.CloudTile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CloudTile extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a cloud tile. During the setup phase, multiple cloud tiles are positioned with some students on them depending on the number of game players.

      Created a CloudTile object.
      Parameters:
      type - The tile type indicating how many students the tile can hold (2 or 3).
      Throws:

    • toString

      public String toString()
